statements: SELECT * FROM new_clothing_arrivals;
SELECT name, category FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE category='Shirts';
SELECT name, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM new_clothing_arrivals ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE category='Jeans' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE category = 'Shoes' AND price BETWEEN 30 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE name LIKE '%T-Shirt%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE category IN ('Jeans', 'Dresses')
SELECT id, category, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT * FROM new_clothing_arrivals
SELECT name, category, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE category = 'Men'
SELECT * FROM new_clothing_arrivals ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name, category FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT name, category, price FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM new_clothing_arrivals WHERE category = 'Shirts' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM new_clothing_arrivals GROUP BY category;
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM new_clothing_arrivals JOIN inventory ON new_clothing_arrivals.id = inventory.item_id WHERE location = 'Store A';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM new_clothing_arrivals GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_arrivals
SELECT id, name, category FROM clothing_arrivals ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, price FROM clothing_arrivals WHERE category = 'Tops'
SELECT id, category, price FROM clothing_arrivals WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, price FROM clothing_arrivals WHERE category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_orders > 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT clothing_arrivals.name, orders.quantity, suppliers.name AS supplier_name FROM clothing_arrivals JOIN orders ON clothing_arrivals.id = orders.clothing_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE orders.quantity > 10;

SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.location, SUM(orders.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.name, suppliers.location ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT clothing_arrivals.name, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, orders.order_date FROM clothing_arrivals JOIN orders ON clothing_arrivals.id = orders.clothing_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM clothing_arrivals;
SELECT name, price FROM clothing_arrivals WHERE category='Tops';
SELECT color, size FROM clothing_colors c JOIN clothing_sizes s ON c.clothing_id = s.clothing_id;
SELECT name, category, price FROM clothing_arrivals ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name, c.category, s.size, co.color FROM clothing_arrivals c JOIN clothing_sizes s ON c.id = s.clothing_id JOIN clothing_colors co ON c.id = co.clothing_id;
SELECT name, category, price FROM clothing_arrivals WHERE category = 'Shirts'
SELECT name, color FROM clothing_arrivals INNER JOIN clothing_colors ON clothing_arrivals.id = clothing_colors.clothing_id WHERE color = 'Blue'
SELECT name, size FROM clothing_arrivals INNER JOIN clothing_sizes ON clothing_arrivals.id = clothing_sizes.clothing_id WHERE size = 'M' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, price, stock_quantity FROM clothing_arrivals INNER JOIN clothing_stock ON clothing_arrivals.id = clothing_stock.clothing_id WHERE price > 50 AND stock_quantity > 0
SELECT DISTINCT category, COUNT(*) FROM clothing_arrivals GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM clothing_category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM clothing_category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, price, color FROM clothing_item WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_id, size, color FROM clothing_item WHERE size = 'M' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT arrival_id, arrival_date FROM clothing_arrival WHERE arrival_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM clothing_category WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, price, color FROM clothing_item WHERE size = 'M' OR size = 'L';
SELECT brand_name FROM clothing_brand ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, arrival_date FROM clothing_supplier JOIN clothing_arrival ON clothing_supplier.supplier_id = clothing_arrival.supplier_id;
SELECT category_name, item_name, price FROM clothing_category JOIN clothing_item ON clothing_category.category_id = clothing_item.category_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
